club.seedymusic.jpa.dao

Class CdDAO.ListControllerParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • club.seedymusic.jpa.dao.CdDAO.ListControllerParameters
  • Enclosing class:
    CdDAO

    private class CdDAO.ListControllerParameters
extends java.lang.Object

    ListControllerParameters Class

    This is a private nested class that provides parameters for the list controller and list methods, allowing greater code refactoring.

    Version:
    Oct 25, 2017 Created this class.
    Author:
    Karim Sultan

      int action
      The action to perform; must be one of the class ACTION constants.
      private static int ACTION_LIST
      ACTION: list all the CDs in database in entirety.
      private static int ACTION_LIST_BYGENRE
      ACTION: list genre matching CDs from DB.

      ACTION: list pages of genre matching CDs from DB.
      private static int ACTION_LIST_PAGED
      ACTION: list pages of CDs from DB.
      private static int ACTION_SEARCH
      ACTION: seaches DB for matches and near matches of title criteria.
      private static int ACTION_SEARCH_PAGED
      ACTION: searches DB for title matches and returns as page.
      private static int ACTION_SEARCHFULL
      ACTION: searches DB for title & genre matches.
      private static int ACTION_SEARCHFULL_PAGED
      ACTION: searches DB for title & genre matches and returns as page.

      The genre criteria.
      int pageSize
      The maximum number of records per page.

      The page start boundary.
